Docs.summary: A Class representing a KubernetesFluxConfiguration along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetKubernetesFluxConfigurationResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetKubernetesFluxConfiguration method.
